channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: I’ve used YouTube Premium for a year, and I’m convinced it’s the ultimate app subscription – and a great Christmas gift
item.description: I’ve said it before, but YouTube Premium really is the real deal – here’s how you can give my favorite subscription as a Christmas present.

item.title: Bad Monkey season 2: everything we know so far about the hit Apple TV show's return
item.description: Bad Monkey season 2 started production in November – here's everything we know so far about the hit show's return to Apple TV.

item.title: Montres Garmin : c’est quoi cet « État de santé » qui peut vous alerter avant que vous ne tombiez malade ?
item.description: Garmin a lancé en 2025 une nouvelle fonction permettant de découvrir votre « état de santé » en se basant sur cinq critères. On fait le point sur cette fonctionnalité et les différentes mesures proposées.

item.title: Save over $600 on the stellar Samsung Odyssey G8 OLED gaming monitor
item.description: The Samsung Odyssey G8 OLED is currently one of the best 4K gaming monitors you can buy – and it just dropped to a new record-low price following a $630 discount.

item.title: En promo à moins de 400 €, mieux vaut glisser sous le sapin le Google Pixel 9a ou le Nothing Phone (3a) ?
item.description: Nothing Phone (3a) d’un côté, et Google Pixel 9a de l’autre : deux milieu de gamme parfaits pour les personnes qui recherchent un smartphone équilibré avec un budget plutôt serré. Mais lequel de ces deux modèles en promotion mérite votre argent ? Découvrez notre comparatif afin de déterminer lequel est fait pour vous.

item.title: The best Christmas gift ideas everyone on your 2025 holiday shopping list will love
item.description: This time of year has a lot of merry and bright things to be excited about, but it can be stressful if you’re stumped on what to get your mom, dad, best friend, coworker or kids’ teacher as a holiday gift. Whether you enjoy or dread buying gifts for people, it’s safe to say we all want to give our loved ones things they will enjoy and appreciate. But there’s a lot of noise, junk and bad deals disguised as good deals to sift through as we get closer and closer to the holidays.Allow us at Engadget to help you through it. Here, you’ll find all of our holiday gift guides collected in one place, so...

item.title: Dogpile’s puzzles mix Balatro, Tetris, and a pile of puppies
item.description: One day, video game critics and journalists will put together a comprehensive study on the impact Balatro had on the industry - of how so many games that came after tried to capture its essence by adding complex systems to otherwise simple, easily understood games. Until then, I'm gonna play Dogpile. Dogpile is a deckbuilding […]

item.title: You can buy your Xbox Ally an official pair of anti-drift joysticks
item.description: Even at $1,000, the Xbox Ally X handheld didn't ship with magnetic drift-resistant joysticks, and neither did the $600 model. But for an extra $20 at Amazon, you can change that today - with officially Asus-approved and sanctioned TMR joysticks from Gulikit, the company that's made a name for itself by supplying aftermarket drift-resistant sticks. […]...

item.title: AirTags are back on sale for $65 for a four-pack
item.description:
Most Apple products are pretty expensive, but some of the most affordable (and useful) ones are AirTags. The Bluetooth trackers are priced pretty reasonably even when not on sale, but they can be a steal if you can get them on a discount — like right now. A four pack of AirTags is on sale for $65 at Amazon, which is only a few dollars more than the record-low price we saw during Black Friday this year.
If you place an order quickly, the AirTags should arrive in time for Christmas, making this a solid choice as a gift for someone with a tendency to misplace stuff. AirTags can also be useful f...

item.title: Cyberattaques en France : les dernières fuites de données et entreprises touchées
item.description: Les cyberattaques continuent de se multiplier en France. De nombreuses entreprises se sont retrouvées dans le viseur des cybercriminels. Ces attaques ont abouti au vol des données personnelles de la plupart des Français. Ci-dessous, on fait le point sur les dernières victimes et l'évolution de la situation.

item.title: The 17 Best Gifts for Plant Lovers We’d Buy Ourselves (2025)
item.description: Plant parents don’t always want another plant—up your gift-giving game with these favorite plant presents we've tested.

item.title: ‘Friend slop’ made co-op gaming goofier than ever in 2025
item.description: When a friend invited me to play a new game called REPO earlier this year, I thought I was wasting my money - not because the game looked bad, but because it looked like Lethal Company. The surprise-hit 2024 co-op survival horror game has players wander through unnerving ruined structures collecting trash while evading monsters. […]

item.title: The switch from Google Assistant to Gemini on Android devices has been pushed back to next year
item.description: Google has said it's revising the timeline for moving Android phones and tablets over to Gemini.
